website_summaries.verdict: This humidifier offers a nice streamlined look and runs longer than many other options before automatically shutting off.
pros: Can be used with any water bottle or glass, or with its included travel bottle
Mist volume of 40 milliliters per hour
Powered by a 5-volt DC micro-USB cable
cons: This option does not seal with its container, making it easy to knock over and spill
USB cable is a short 3 feet

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I travel frequently for work
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I travel frequently for work, and often get aggravated sinuses from dry hotel rooms. This little thing is small but efficient and has made a huge difference. I love it and plan to buy more for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: I use few drops of essential oils. It smells pretty good. First I thought it will blow warm mist but it actually blow cool mist which I like it. It’s a useful cute little humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Namaan

customer_reviews.title: Nice try
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my office. It’s cute and nice. I think I’ll use it everyday when heat coming.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: fits nicely in a bathroom kit/bag
customer_reviews.text: Positive: portability; fits nicely in a bathroom kit/bag. Negative: turns over easily and water spills; top heavy; had it close by bedside and would hit it in the night with my arm reaching for my water bottle. Otherwise I like just fine. It's not my go-to for home bedside humidifier/diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C. Rose

customer_reviews.title: It does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It puts out plenty of mist. It uses a wick tube and comes with one spare. Those will have to be tossed after they get mineralized. The biggest problem in my opinion is how bright the light is when it is running. Too bright to be by the bed while trying to sleep and no way to disable the light.
customer_reviews.author: pennygail

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it did much
customer_reviews.text: Updated: it really puts out such a small amount of moisture, it's doing not much. Would not buy again. It works as described, just not sure it's really moisturizing/humidifying the air very much. I had it on next to my bed for about a week and couldn't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly in MI

customer_reviews.title: Helps with nasal moisture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my nosebleeds during the wintertime since the heater dries up my nasal canals. So far I like the humidifier especially the small design of it so I can pack it for college. I do wish it had multiple settings though
customer_reviews.author: Wei Li

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in 3 weeks. Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Broke twice in 2 months (got a replacement and that worked for 3 weeks as well)
customer_reviews.author: Sooooo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It’s small and a little light so I stand it in a coffee cup as it’s next to my bed and I din’t want to knock it in over. Works through the night. Helps me breath better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cause it so small and easy to use! Just add water and press power, it also using usb cable so I can plug it to my external battery and put it anywhere I want
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night. Love that I can get the correct filters for it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and works well.
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We can easily move it to where we need it to be and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: We used this first in our 6 hour long drive. It’s a perfect situation. Last time me and my wife had a blood staining from nose during road trip due to dry weather. However, this time we were fortunate to have this. Thank you and will recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Mithun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic dry eye so my doctor suggested a usb humidifier so that I would use it whenever I'm at my computer working. It has made a huge difference! I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: Its small and just great for use while travelling.
customer_reviews.text: The on/off switch is somewhat fragile. So be careful while refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Sashayln

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading tabletop use.
customer_reviews.text: A nice product, but i need more of an output.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. TBI

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved the product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a humidifier for a really long time, and this is exactly what I wanted. My room feels much better now and I highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it blew out a little more humidity but a great product for small area.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my desk at work. Small, stylish and the USB power is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly
customer_reviews.text: I wish I was kidding. Broke instantly when I tried to open the device in order to soak the cotton filter, as indicated in the instructions. (The instructions provide no information on how to open it.) Incredibly shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.  Not great product.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this humidifier. Small, cheap and quiet. However: 1. The blue light that turns on when the unit is working is WAY too bright for a bedroom. With no way of turning it off it's a complete deal breaker. 2. I ran it for one night and it soaked the whole surrounding area with water. All over my lamp, alarm clock, wall and table. Going to buy a REAL wicking humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great for traveling. Hotel rooms are so dry and I don't want to carry a full size humidifier. This is small enough to easily pack and you can use any cup with it rather than the included one (allowing it to be even smaller and take up less space).
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by voice pro
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended to me by a fellow voice professional. Used to help keep the air (near you) humidified while speaking or singing for extended periods of time. It works really nicely! It’s just a bit loud for me (musician), but you get used to it’s hum. My wish list of improvements: quieter and a longer cord, please.
customer_reviews.author: Studio59

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Received. Used 1x. A few days later I went to use again at work and it doesn’t work. The unit got very hot and I was concerned about fire hazard. Unplugged it immediately. Will be returning UPDATE: Seller has reached out and is working to remedy the situation. It is evident they care about customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Phnkygrl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Great for traveling with dry eye.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my desk. Our office air can be dry and I can be sensitive to dry eye. It works great, super easy to setup and use and it has drown a lot of interest from my co-workers. My sister has used this humifier for 5 years and we have travelled with it extensively. Highly recommend for offices and for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rasta Kitty

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT AND NEEDS VERY LITTLE CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: MINE STOP WORKING. I WAS DEVASTATED; TOOK ME A FEW DAYS TO FIGURE OUT THAT THE SPRING SOMEHOW FELL OUT WHEN REFILLING WITH WATER AND IT WILL NOT WORK WITHOUT IT. SO HERE IS THE FIX.... I WRAP A TISSUE AROUND THE BLUE LIGHT AT NIGHT WHICH HELPS A GREAT DEAL WITH THE BRIGHT LIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Marj  K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Desktop While Working!
customer_reviews.text: This device is terrific for a small workspace - Multifunctional Portable Mini Humidifier USB Cool Mist Humidifier with Water Bottle. Its small enough to not be in the way and it surprisingly put out a great deal of mist. I use with filtered water and sometimes with essential oil Breathe Easier. Big help in preventing sinusitis in low humidity winter months!
customer_reviews.author: R. Carr

customer_reviews.title: The product is ok
customer_reviews.text: It is portable and works best in long drives. It is very handy, my kids use it in the house. My son has asthma and it really helps him with his breathing in clean air. Thank you seller
customer_reviews.author: Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: A Travel Must-Have!
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is awesome for travel! It's so easy to use and clean. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: Finally receive it! I thought I almost lost it...It's so cute! worth my waiting😉
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night and it's been a great help!
customer_reviews.author: B20122

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday at my desk and no longer have the burning, dry nasal symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Packaging not intact upon arrival. Horrible product. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M Chepan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money & highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great little product which can enhance any room, car or space and sells ar a competitive price. Good value for money & highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Norman

customer_reviews.title: love it. it is always in my car
customer_reviews.text: love it. it is always in my car. gear for the winter season. I put eucalyptus in it to help with colds.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Orsburn

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy design. Need locking mechanism for bottle
customer_reviews.text: Portable and easy to use, simply fill the bottle with distilled water and place the head into the bottle. The cotton bar which soaks the water, was already inserted into the head (It came with additional cotton bar). It is charged with standard usb charger, so you can use it anywhere, even in car. It releases little mist,enough for small area. It turns on blue light when on and red light when off. It is noiseless. On the negative side, wished they had kept the option to lock the bottle. Twice, while using the mist humidifier, I accidently knocked the bottle and it fell down spreading the water everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a Godsend for small spaces and areas!
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this year I had to start using a CPAP machine, and oh my does it dry my poor nasal passages out! The problem however is with the normal stuff on my nightstand and the CPAP machine, there was little to no room for anything else - there certainly wasn't room for any humidifier! And that is where this cute little machine comes in handy! It's very quiet, and it runs for 8 hours before it shuts itself off! It's the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: CMac -Amazon Addict!

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is really neat! The best thing about it is how easy it is to use! I have it sitting on my desk at my office. It makes such a huge difference. My office is so dry and I'm constantly sneezing. I haven't sneezed once since I got this. It comes with a replacement filter and very good instructions. It's very small so you barely notice it. It's also very quiet. I can barely hear it's little wheeze. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Made it truly portable with a power bank!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something small to help get my plants humidity but I don't have an outlet nearby...So I plugged the usb into a cell phone power bank and it works great!!! So convenient, I can pretty much just take it anywhere I want. Provides a good mist, noise level is low/med. Easy to use and refill.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a portable device and my wife has discovered that it actually works pretty well in a cupholder of a car when plugged into a USB-car charger. This is her new favorite, personal humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Labye

customer_reviews.title: Never worked - no water comes out, even after pre-soaking the wick.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Easy to set up but no water comes out, even after pre-soaking the wick.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Compact design
customer_reviews.text: Compact design! During the dry months of winter my oldest daughter has suffered from frequent bloody noses and this easy to use compact humidifier does the trick! The dry air we have had the last few months has definitely caused moisture to evaporate from my skin and our whole family's respiratory symptoms have worsened over time. This small little humidifier has added moisture to the air and has counteracted these problems. Its perfect to sit on her nightstand during the night without the hassle of reorganizing or moving anything to make room. We seriously unboxed and set it up in less than a minute. After pressing the on switch it started working immediately!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is super portable and extremely beneficial. We noticed the overall improvement of the family's overall well-being when we bought a humidifier for our living area. Due to this huge improvement in the improvement in the way the entire family feels, we decided to give this travel size a go. My husband has taken this to work with him to keep at his desk because he is currently battling dryness. This has helped him feel so much better in having the benefit of this cool mist running at work. It is portable, does the job well, and has quality health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great in the car and home office
customer_reviews.text: As small as this humidifier is, I figured it would only work well in my car. However, it does a really nice job in small to medium sized rooms too. Since getting this, I've been using it nearly everyday iny car and home office. It's yet to do anything but function properly. I've also had no issues hitting the humidity level I prefer. This is whisper quiet and very efficient. Overall, for as tiny as this is, it really does a great job. Recommended 4 stars Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far ....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I had one like this that was really similar, but it stopped working after a couple of weeks. So I’m still holding my breath about this one. But it already seems like it’s better quality, has a better output and it last for HOURS and HOURS! I think I started mine around 4 pm and I think it was still running around 9 or 10 pm. I did not see any instructions about the water, but when it comes to devices like this, I always recommend using only distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Cross-eyed cat

customer_reviews.title: The little "titan" we all need
customer_reviews.text: Winter is leaving so this humidifier will be the order of the day. I didn't think that something so tiny would make your life easy. In Texas the weather is very dry and high humidity, so I have a solution. It's super small I can put it on the desk and my room. The material surprised me because at first glance it seemed like a toy 😳 I thought it wouldn't work but I was wrong. In my opinion it is not loud and lasts a long time. Welcome to my house 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ana Figueroa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea
customer_reviews.text: This does put out visible mist; however, the light makes it unsuitable for night use. I have it in my office for winter when the heat is drying out the air. It mostly puts mist up that falls right back down. I'm not sure how well it can be working to "humidify" the area given how much water falls right down. It is a cute idea, and it is definitely portable, but it would be better without a light.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R. Arnholt

customer_reviews.title: Well made, loos nice, works well. Great for office or a small room
customer_reviews.text: Its a tiny portable humidifier. Perfect for office or a small bedroom for when the air is dry - during the winter months here. Looks very nice. Easy to use - fill up with the water, plug it in -let it do its thing. Not loud. Recommend that you use filtered or such water. Like it. Recommend as its works, well made and looks nice. Great for office or a small room
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier was very easy to set up and started working quickly. You just need to fill the cup with water, put the top on, plug it in and turn it on. It's cool mist, which is nice. Keep in mind that this unit is very small and would work best to keep on your desk or right next to your pillow. It probably won't make a dent in an actual room.
customer_reviews.author: Mereseydotes

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is perfect for what I needed: I have a tiny office at work, and the air is unbearably dry when AC or heat is working full force. It doesn't add a ton of moisture, but releases enough steam for me to breathe easier.
customer_reviews.author: Z

product_meta.title: Portable Mini Humidifier USB Cool Mist Ultrasonic Humidifier with Water Bottle Premium Humidifying Unit with Whisper-Quiet Operation Automatic Shut-Off Multi Use for Travel Home Office Bedroom
feature_bullets: MHZ MICROPOROUS VAPORIZER&PORTABLE SMALL SIZE: Anti-Corrosion, acid, Vaporizing purified water without white power phenomenon. Small and lightweight enough to take it wherever you go, even your car.

SAFE AUTOMATIC SHUT-OFF: No worry while sleeping. The humidifier will be shut-off after 8 hours automatically; After Automatic shutdown, you can open again and continue to use. Compatible with any water container.

SUPER SILENT ULTRASONIC DESIGN: Offer cold mist and quiet operation which guarantee do not disturb you through work or rest. It is less than 15db which is perfect for Baby Room, Bedroom, Office, as Car humidifier, Yoga or Spa.
COOL MIST ANYWHERE: Increases air moisture for easier breathing. Ideal for desks, single rooms, travel hotel room, planes and children rooms, office, your car etc. Puts moisture back into dry air
EASY USE AND FASHION LOOK: You can take out and insert the main part into any glass or bottle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
